text.section:
An authority may:
issue bonds for any of its corporate purposes;
issue refunding bonds to pay or retire its bonds; and
issue any kinds of bonds, including bonds on which the principal and interest are payable:
only from the income and revenues of the housing project financed with the proceeds of the bonds or with these proceeds and a grant from the State or federal government in aid of the housing project;
only from the income and revenues of designated housing projects whether or not they were financed wholly or partly with the proceeds of the bonds; or
from its revenues generally.
To secure any of its bonds, an authority may pledge any revenue or mortgage a housing project or other property of the authority.
